medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced frequent partial or complete erectile failure lasting 1-3 months and premature ejaculation associated with marital quarrels over the past 4 years. He had occasional calf pain or cramps and reported variable complaints of chest pain not related to sexual activity.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hospitalized in 1968 for involutional melancholia, had several brief psychotic depressions, was evaluated for intermittently impotence, and previously hospitalized for heat stroke with hepatic and renal dysfunction in 1973.
medical_history.social_history: Worked as a stock clerk, engaged in episodic alcohol abuse, and had preoccupation with homosexual fantasies.
